name: getTransactionCategorizationRulesDeprecated
description: The get transaction categorization rule service is used to get all the categorization rules.

$ul:
**categoryLevelId**: The level of the category for which the rule is created.

Applicable containers: creditCard, insurance, loan

**memId**: Unique identifier of the user.

Applicable containers: creditCard, investment, insurance, loan

**ruleClauses**: Details of rules.

Applicable containers: creditCard, investment, insurance, loan

**rulePriority**: The order in which the rules get executed on transactions.

Applicable containers: creditCard, investment, insurance, loan

**transactionCategorisationId**: Category id that is assigned to the transaction when the transaction matches the rule clause. This is the id field of the transaction category resource.

Applicable containers: creditCard, investment, insurance, loan

**userDefinedRuleId**: Unique identifier generated for every rule the user creates.

Applicable containers: creditCard, investment, insurance, loan
